fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Premium Kit
fields.description: Pika Pika Rain PREMIUM KIT Ceramic Coating forms a 100% genuine-glass coating [ ceramic coating ] on your car body by reacting with moisture in the air. Once cured, the glass layer protects the car body for up to 3 years. The glass coating [ ceramic coating ] layer produces a luxurious gloss and provides excellent water repellency on your car body.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain Deluxe
fields.description: 5 Yrs Durability. Pika Pika Rain DELUXE Ceramic Coating is developed for customers who treasure their cars. It is the very best quality coating only for professionals! It is unrivaled in glass content, hardness, anti-dirt power and durability in the Pika Pika Rain Ceramic Coating series.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain X210
fields.description: 3 yrs durability. Pika Pika Rain X210 Ceramic Coating forms a 100% genuine-glass coating [ ceramic coating ] on your car body by reacting with moisture in the air. Once cured, the glass layer protects the car body for up to 3 years. The glass coating [ ceramic coating ] layer produces a luxurious gloss and provides excellent water repellency on your car body.

fields.name: Pika Pika Rain PREMIUM KIT Ceramic Coating
fields.description: 3 yrs durability. Pika Pika Rain Premium Ceramic Coating forms a 100% genuine-glass coating [ ceramic coating ] on your car body by reacting with moisture in the air. Once cured, the glass layer protects the car body for up to 3 years. The glass coating [ ceramic coating ] layer produces a luxurious gloss and provides excellent water repellency on your car body.

fields.name: Soft99 King of Gloss
fields.description: The dark version makes both darker-coloured finishes and mid-tone colours look slightly darker (almost like a mild tinting effect), while the light version makes lighter-coloured finishes look brighter. To achieve unparalleled levels of gloss and durability, simply apply SOFT99 King of Gloss over a basecoat of SOFT99 Fusso Coat Wax.

fields.name: CC Wax Gold
fields.description: Prostaff CC Wax Gold car wax is a car wax that provides a glossy finish to your paintwork and contains natural carnauba and quartz leaving a hydrophobic finish. The CC Water series is categorised into four different classes, the higher the level of class the better as it provides better gloss, water-dropping effect, the smoothness of the paint and durability.

fields.name: Soft99 Fusso Light
fields.description: Wax which creates hydrophobic and protective coating durable for up to 12 months. Thanks to unique fluoropolymers, the coating effectively reduces adhesion of dirt and repels water. The paint is protected against negative effects of weather conditions such as acid rain, UV radiation and road salt. The product is dedicated to dark coloured paintwork.

fields.name: Pika Nano Rain 1
fields.description: Nano Pika Pika Rain Type-H adds an extra layer of protection over the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] made by Pika Pika Rain.It produces hydrophobic effect. Nano Pika Pika Rain can also just be used as a quick coating spray too.

fields.name: Pika Nano Rain 2
fields.description: Nano Pika Pika Rain Type-S adds an extra layer of protection over the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] made by Pika Pika Rain.It produces hydrophilic effect. Nano Pika Pika Rain can also just be used as a quick coating spray too.

fields.name: Pika Nano Rain 3
fields.description: Nano Pika Pika Rain Type-K adds an extra layer of protection over the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] made by Pika Pika Rain.It produces hydrophilic effect. Nano Pika Pika Rain can also just be used as a quick coating spray too.

fields.name: Pika Nano Rain 2
fields.description: Nano Pika Pika Rain Type-S adds an extra layer of protection over the glass coating [ ceramic coating ] made by Pika Pika Rain.It produces hydrophilic effect. Nano Pika Pika Rain can also just be used as a quick coating spray too.
